summary.span: 控制對共用屬性群組的存取。

span.span: Controls access to shared property groups.

summary.span: 尋找或建立具有指定資訊的屬性群組。

span.span: Finds or creates a property group with the given information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`dwIsoMode`，而在 get 和 set 作業，您可以選擇讓鎖定屬性藉由指定的不可部分完成，或要鎖定之方法的持續期間內的屬性則是由指定呼叫。Using `dwIsoMode`, during get and set operations, you can either choose to make locking properties atomic by specifying , or to lock properties over the duration of the method call by specifying . > [!CAUTION] > 請勿使用時建立屬性群組中的建構函式，這樣做會導致死結。Do not use when creating a property group in a constructor, doing so can result in a deadlock. 如果指定的發行模式`dwRelMode`已，所指定的屬性`name`會保留在程序的存留期內保持運作。If the release mode specified for `dwRelMode` is , the property specified by `name` is held alive for the lifetime of the process. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`CreatePropertyGroup`方法用來建立共用的屬性群組管理員。The following code example shows how to use the `CreatePropertyGroup` method to create a shared property group manager. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties/CPP/receiptcounterclass.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties/CS/receiptcounterclass.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties/VB/receiptcounterclass.vb#2)]
